Salary
N200,000 monthly.&nbsp;

Method of Application

Administrative Assistant Job at Odixcity Consulting




        
    

        
        Odixcity Consulting is an International Hr consulting and procurement firm. With expertise in Recruitment & Selection, Performance management, Training & Development, Compensation and benefits as well as Outsourcing of goods and services for organizations.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Administrative Assistant

Job Location: Lagos (Remote) 

Job Description
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a highly organized, detail-oriented Administrative Assistant to join our team.
	The ideal candidate should be proactive, reliable, and able to manage multiple tasks while working independently.
	You will play a key role in supporting daily operations and ensuring smooth communication across the organization.


Responsibilities


	Respond to emails and messages promptlyand coordinate meetings and schedules using digital tools.
	Prepare and organize documents, reports, and presentations, alongside managing calendars.
	Maintains files and records, and Update database ensuringdata accuracy.
	Track project progress and deadlinesand collaborate with team members on task assignments.
	Manages budgets and expenses as needed, while preparingreports and presentations.
	Adherestronglyto company policies and proceduresand updatethe team on relevant compliance issues.
	Facilitate on-boarding for new employeesand organize team-building activities and events.


Requirements


	A Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration, or a relating field.
	3 years of Proven experience as an administrative assistant.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office, Google Workspace,and other productivity tools.
	Ability to work independently and manage remote workflows.
	Experience with project management tools (e.g., Asana, Trello, Monday.com)
	Familiarity with CRM or database systems.
	Previous remote work experience.
	Ability to work independently and manage remote workflows.
	High attention to detail and problem-solving skills.
	Reliable internet connection and a quiet workspace.
	Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
	Strong organizational and time-management abilities.


Salary
N200,000 monthly. 

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and portfolio to: odixcityconsulting@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Whether you’re visiting for business or leisure, our dedicated team is on hand to ensure your every need is met—so you can fully immerse yourself in the serenity and energy of our waterfront setting.

Beyond providing stylish accommodations, we celebrate the vibrant local culture through events, dining experiences, and thoughtful guest activities. Join us and discover the perfect blend of relaxation, adventure, and authentic Lagos charm.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Hotel Receptionist

Job Location: Ibeju-Lekki, Lagos

Responsibilities


	Welcome guests and provide effecient check-in and check-out services.
	Handle telephone calls, emails, in-person inquiries professionally.
	Maintain accurate guest registration and billing information in the hotel system.
	Process room reservations.

	Provide guests with information about hotel facilities, services and attractions.

	Upsell room upgrades and other services to guests.
	Monitor lobby area and ensure clean and welcoming environment.


Requirement


	Minimum of 3 years of experience as hotel receptionist in a luxury hotel.


Remuneration
We offer a competitive remuneration package.
